metadata.description: WAR OF THE WORLDS! Killraven saves a young boy named John from a Martian attack after they took his mother's life right before his eyes. Reminiscing on how his mother was killed, Killraven decides to protect John from any harm caused by anyone. But the martians aren't the only ones Killraven and his gang have to watch out for when Mint Julep and her army storm in. Will Killraven be able to save the freemen and still be able to protect John?
metadata.name: Killraven
